text: Community structure is actually one of the questions that is rarely addressed explicitly. Maybe loosely coupled smaller communities are more effective. Maybe not. Also: how is community structured related to communication tools? All we have is chat-type interaction. I suspect most of us would agree that this is not ideal, but then we don't have a clear idea of how to do better.
